author: pipermerriam
content: Anyone who wants an invite to the implementers call DM me with the email address you'd like the invite sent to

author: mike.ferris
content: Could you expand on this? I'm not seeing how this isn't a chicken-and-egg situation where you need the correct headers in order to verify that the accumulators you've received are correct, and you need the accumulators to verify that the headers are correct (part of the canonical chain). I might have missed something in my reading.

author: pipermerriam
content: I've got a write up incoming for this

author: pipermerriam
content: My thoughts on how we side-step the "chicken/egg" problem without having a `Header.accumulator_root` field added to the protocol.  https://notes.ethereum.org/KaMqlqxiQLCWyDoXCUCC4Q

author: pipermerriam
content: <@!843971820994822184> ^ lemme know if you have further questions.  I don't promise that document is incredibly well put together so if there's anything confusing speak up.
